name: Event Recap Social Media Post
description: Create engaging social media posts to recap your event and share highlights with your audience.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Compose 3 creative social media posts to recap [event name] {{event_name}} with key message {{key}} on social media platforms {{media_platform}} that are no more than 280 characters each. Make sure to include relevant hashtags.

key.title: Key Takeaways (Optional)
key.description: Briefly list 2-3 key takeaways or learnings from the event.

ui_metadata.value: AI tools can enhance creativity, not replace it. The future of creative collaboration: humans & AI working together.

media_platform.title: Social Media Platform (Optional)
media_platform.description: Choose the social media platform (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, Instagram) where you want to post the recap.)
